profile.summary:
A software engineer and open source contributor with 4+ years experience on software development, web design and development, git, writing unit and end-to-end tests, deployment and setup CI server.
Actively contributing to open source and listed as one of the top 10 JavaScript GitHub developer in Indonesia by git-awards.com
